description:
A defense mechanism that helps protect against use of web browser tools data exfiltration and initial access.
When a user asks the AI system to access a URL, it will ask a web search and have access only to information that the index provides. The URL will is not accessed by the AI System at all.

external_references.title: Data, privacy, and security for web queries in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Microsoft Copilot

name: Content Security Policy

object_references.description: Microsoft Copilot for M365 cannot browse websites. Instead, its web browsing tool has access to the data available on Bing's index for the relevant website page.
